title: Didn't get Rune Collector rewards
body: So I just finished the Rune Collector mission and I didn't get the 6500 BE, I waited, tried buying something in the shop, logged out and in again, but I still didn't get the reward, the mission is under completed missions, do i have to somehow manually collect the rewards or is this just a bug?

replies.body: As Akito said, it's redeemable in the Loot tab.. You'll notice in the mission(s) that the "actual" reward is blue essence "orbs" of varying values (for example, you would probably have a 5K or 6K with 1 or 3 500 to fill in the rest).
I Didn't even get the mission!
You needed to buy old runes when they were not on 99% discount that was 2 moths ago...
How do you even get the mission? I havent got it on my account, and my friend did, is it... for everyone, or something?
You needed to buy old runes when they were not on discord for 99% that was about two moths ago...
how do you even complete the quest
you have to play a game
How do you even complete the mission? I have that in missions, but i dont know how to collect the orbs/essence to complete the mission in the first place
ah i see, have to play a game. Got it
its in your "loot" tab, the reward becomes a consumable you use :)
